post_header.content:
For Groups, We’re the Best Among Boutique Hotels in New York 

The Hotel @ Times Square is the right choice for group travel, thanks to our location, daily continental breakfast, and on-site fitness and business centers. Please contact us using the form below to get information about booking your next group trip to Manhattan.

Personal information collected is used solely for serving requests for proposals and other marketing materials. Visit our privacy policy page to contact us to review or delete the data collected.
